reviews.review_msg: Dr.Mund is the best. Take him over any other choices.He is the best........  .
Awesome prof. Very very clear, teaches the material well, and is very helpful and approachable. Final is fair if you remember the labs. Overall excellent prof.

Had her for this lab in Fall '04. Quizzes pretty tough, but the final exam was quite easy. Major complaint is that the marking is unclear and it's too easy to lose marks in your lab reports. Other complaint - unlike Kreis, if you really NEED an answer and you just can't get it, she won't tell you, she'll keep talking around it.
She is so mean.  But then, she is pretty dedicated.  So I dont no.  I think though deep-down she is a nice person:).
